author: Ktn News
title: Opposition Leader Raila Odinga reminds majority leader Aden Duale of his mentorship - VIDEO | The Standard
text:
KTN Prime / 1 day ago [VIDEO] Opposition Leader Raila Odinga reminds majority leader Aden Duale of his mentorship 
You were nothing! I made you who you are…these were opposition leader Raila Odinga’s remarks as he launched a scathing attack against majority leader of the national assembly Aden Duale. Raila told residents of Garissa town that he gave Duale a political lifeline but Duale turned against. Raila was speaking during a tour to the north eastern region to rally for more people to register as voters as the exercise hits the homestretch. Related Videos
